rooms.description: A spacious open-plan area combining living space, dining area, and kitchen, designed with sustainable materials and ample natural light. The layout is wheelchair accessible, featuring wide corridors and adjustable fixtures.
A dedicated workspace located adjacent to the living area for seamless integration of work and home life. The office is designed with ample light, storage solutions, and ergonomic furniture.
A private bedroom for the head of the family, with sustainable wood finishes and energy-efficient lighting. The room follows Vastu guidelines to ensure positive energy flow.
Two additional bedrooms for children or family members. These rooms are designed with space-saving furniture and ample storage to maintain an eco-friendly and clutter-free environment.

A modern bathroom designed to meet the needs of a family of four with features such as grab bars and wheelchair-accessible fixtures. The design incorporates water-saving fixtures in line with eco-friendly practices.

openings.description: The main entrance is wheelchair-accessible and features a wide door with automated options. The design incorporates natural materials, ensuring compliance with local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
A secondary exit designed for emergency purposes and additional wheelchair access. It follows safety regulations and maintains the aesthetic of the overall design.

Provides direct, level access to the swimming pool area, ensuring a smooth transition for all users including those in wheelchairs. The area is designed with non-slip surfaces and eco-friendly landscaping.
